name: Unstable Voyage
description:
Made in three days flat for Ludum Dare 49 (jam category.) 

Use WASD / cursors and Space for jump. Try and stay on the raft and stop your stuff falling off. Click the game window to enable the one whole sound effect!

This 1.0.1 build was made the day after the deadline and fixes a couple of small bugs.

Might possibly build this out some more but not until after LD play / rate is all done.

Made with Love and Coffee by Bee <3
